entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
